SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.DATA_SOURC_NM, A.SERVER_NM, A.DBMS_KND, A.CECK_SQL, A.MNGR_NM, A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, A.MNTRNG_STTUS, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREAT_DT, B.CODE_NM DBMS_KIND_NM, C.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS_NM FROM COMTNDBMNTRNG A, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.DBMS_KND = B.CODE AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = C.CODE AND B.CODE_ID = 'COM048' AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM046'
AND A.DATA_SOURC_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.SERVER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.MNGR_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND C.CODE_NM LIKE #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY A.DATA_SOURC_NM ASC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT A.DATA_SOURC_NM, A.SERVER_NM, A.DBMS_KND, A.CECK_SQL, A.MNGR_NM, A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, A.MNTRNG_STTUS, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREAT_DT, B.CODE_NM DBMS_KIND_NM, C.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS_NM FROM COMTNDBMNTRNG A, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.DBMS_KND = B.CODE AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = C.CODE AND B.CODE_ID = 'COM048' AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.DATA_SOURC_NM = #{dataSourcNm}
